duties_responsibilities.duty: Independently evaluate services provided to individuals with mental illness and/or developmental disabilities; conduct studies to evaluate program needs, processes, outcomes, impacts, costs/benefits, effectiveness, and individuals’ satisfaction.
Collect, review, and analyze quantitative data related to programmatic services; produce management reports and recommend programmatic improvements based on analyses.
Develop and modify survey instruments and data collection systems; supervise staff engaged in program evaluation activities.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree plus three years of program evaluation experience in a human services setting. Master's degree preferred.
